title: Learn about the twenty most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin for the presence of madness in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing madness in a dream Madness is the feeling of being unable to control one’s mind and actions together through this article for the correct interpretation. Interpretation of madness in a dream The interpretation of a dream about madness in general is the opposite of all expectations, as it is good news for the fortuneteller and good evidence that will change his life for the better, There is no need to worry. Seeing madness in an unmarried girl’s dream is a disappointment that she will face and her inability to achieve her dreams. If a married woman sees madness in her dream, this means that the conditions of her marriage are constantly improving and she will become pregnant in the very near future. When a pregnant woman sees madness in her dream, this means that It means that she will give birth to a beautiful, healthy boy, and that her birth will be easy and without problems - God willing. If a young man sees madness in his dream, this is a sign of passion and love, and he has fallen madly in love. It was said that when you see madness in a dream, it generally shows a lot of money, but you will spend it without the expense and bad things. Interpretation of seeing madness in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a mad man in her dream, this is evidence that this girl will have a young man who loves her and will ask for a relationship. Legal with her in the near future - God willing -. An unmarried girl seeing a crazy person in her dream is evidence of her salvation from an evil that could have befallen her and from the evil of magic, and a crazy man in a dream is her fiancé’s crazy love for her. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google From an Egyptian dream interpretation website.Interpretation of a dream about a crazy person by Ibn SirinOne of the most common afflictions that a person falls into is madness, or harming the mind with anything evil. Therefore, dreaming of madness is a source of terror for many dreamers for fear that it will come true. Therefore, Ibn Sirin referred to the symbol of madness in a dream, which is magic, knowing that there is a type of magic in waking life called the magic of madness, and since magic and envy are mentioned in the Qur’an, this. The vision is correct, and these difficult cases are based on the Qur’an, specifically Surat Al-Baqarah, which is famous for keeping the harm of demons away from homes, as well as expelling them from the dreamer’s body if he becomes exhausted. Jinn. Madness in Ibn Sirin’s dream does not only mean loss of reason, but rather indicates adversity in general. It is confusion and a nervous breakdown, and he may suddenly scream and cry. This happens in the event of the death of a loved one or the loss of something major, such as losing all the money. Therefore, the symbol of madness in the dream is associated with the appearance of anything negative in the person’s life. As the dreamer and Ibn Sirin said, the dreamer sometimes dreams that he is crazy as an expression of what will happen to him of great plunder and theft of his property, and he may also be in danger from minor thieves. If a man sees a crazy girl or woman in his dream, but he will not appear in the dream as if he is afraid of her, On the contrary, he will run after her to catch up with her. Here, Ibn Sirin said: Seeing such a vision has two indications. The first evidence: If God continues to run after this woman who has lost her mind and successfully overtakes her, this means that he is striving in his wakefulness for something great or a great goal that he hopes to achieve and is proud of himself through.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of dreams of seeing a dead mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. The mother has an excellent position in all religions, even non-heavenly, and losing a mother is a disaster for children. For this reason, to see a dead mother during your sleep, perhaps due to overthinking. It is human nature to feel safe with your mother and it is known The mind does not stop working even during periods of sleep. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing a mother after her death is related to the state in which she lives, as well as seeing a dead mother in a sick or angry dream, and these indications indicate the meaning of the dream and because the vision. He has a message to deliver on the Shamla website to clarify the meaning of seeing the mother of the greatest Muslim scholar “Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi”, as well as the interpretation of seeing the dead mother to a psychiatrist. George Armitage Miller. And signs, and there are representative actions. If you are sick, seeing your mother giving birth to you means that you will die, because the child is wrapped in a cloth like a dead person. If you are poor, and you see that your mother is giving birth to you, then you will obtain goodness and abundance, because the boy is not able to take care of her, and there are those who He spends on her. Suffering from anxiety, dreaming of a living dead mother in a dream is the disappearance of anxiety and pain by the will of the Almighty God. It indicates goodness and grace if he sees your mother talking to you and she is in good condition and you will hear good news about your troublesome affairs. Looking at the mother in her usual condition shows Joy in her heart. A married woman seeing her mother is a sign of a happy married life. Seeing a dead mother crying means that you will get sick. Miller’s interpretation of a dream about a dead mother If you see your dead mother standing in your house, you will receive goodness and blessings. It means goodness and grace if you see your mother talking to you and doing well , and you will hear good news in your annoying problems. A married woman sees her mother as a sign that her affairs are improving with her husband. Looking at the mother, whether she is alive or dead and sick, this indicates your sadness due to her death or rumors that affect your reputation. If you see in your dream that your mother is calling With you, it means that your behavior is pointless and no one is happy with your shortcomings. A dead mother crying in a dream: Crying in general indicates great sadness and may indicate reprimand. But the good thing is that Muslim commentators believe that a mother's tears in a dream symbolize goodness, but if the crying is dangerous, then it is not good for you to see. Psychologically, seeing your mother crying loudly may indicate that you want to see her, and this vision may be repeated among exiles. As for seeing your mother sad, perhaps because you think about her a lot, and you are very sad for her, she is suffering just like you, so do not worry about looking To your mother in this sad state, because it expresses what is inside you and remember that dreams are a relief from the anguish that we suffer from and psychological conflicts. I missed your mother and therefore your subconscious mind summoned her image to alleviate the impact of this desire. Interpretation of seeing my deceased mother sick in

title: I dreamed that worms were coming out of my body

preview.html: I dreamed that worms came out of my body in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. A worm is an invertebrate animal that contains many species, most of which are harmful to humans and animals with diseases and spread to humans through water, vegetables or meat, and today through this article we will present to youI dreamed that worms They come out of my body. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether she is single or married. I dreamed that worms came out of my body, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing worms coming out of the mouth in a dream. It appears that the priest often speaks about people with words. Bad and false. Seeing worms coming out of the stomach in a dream indicates that God will save the dreamer from evil people in his life and his relationship with them will end. Worms coming out of the anus in a dream announces that the dreamer will be blessed with good offspring, children and grandchildren. Seeing worms coming out of the body in general in a dream indicates That the dreamer has been freed from all the problems he was facing in the recent period. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream. I dreamed that worms were coming out of my body for the sake of Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi would interpret seeing a worm coming out of the ear in a dream that indicates the presence of bad and false talk about the monarch behind his back. Worms Coming out of the eye in a dream. It appears that the dreamer is envied by those close to him. Seeing worms coming out of the mouth in a dream appears that the person with insight crushes many people and says bad things about them. The presence of worms in the bed in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is exposed to something bad from someone close to him, and God knows best. Seeing worms in the bed in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller is exposed to something bad from someone close to him, and God knows best. They eat in the body in a dream, which indicates in his life evil people who are jealous of him and covet his money. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing white worms in a dream. I dreamed that worms came out of my body. Seeing individual worms coming out of her body in a dream shows that he will reach the goal that he has been seeking for a long time. White worms coming out of her body in a dream for unmarried women. This may indicate that she will meet a good young man who will propose to her and her life will be happy with him. Seeing individual black worms in a dream indicates being harmed by someone he loves and trusts deeply, and God knows best. I dreamed that worms were coming out of my body from Yes, a married woman. A married woman sees a worm coming out of her organs in a dream. It indicates that God will make her pregnant soon, and God knows best. Worms coming out of the mouth of a married woman in a dream. This vision is a warning to her that she must treat people with greater caution. A married woman seeing worms in a dream in general indicates an abundance of Disagreements and crises between her and her husband during this period, which may lead to separation. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a leech in a dream. I dreamed that I was pregnant with worms coming out of my body. Seeing pregnant worms coming out of her body in a dream indicates that she will undergo an easy birth process during which she will not suffer from pain or pain. Fatigue. White worms in a pregnant woman’s dream announce that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Seeing black worms in a pregnant woman’s dream announces that she will give birth to a baby girl.

title: Interpretation of the evening prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing the afternoon prayer in a dream Prayer is the foundation of religion and one of the most important pillars of Islam, and it is one of the acts of worship that forbids obscenity and evil, and with this vision we understand whether this vision is good or bad. The dream of the evening prayer in Ibn Sirin’s dream The interpretation of the dream of the evening prayer inside the Holy Kaaba in a dream is evidence However, the dreamer will be in an excellent position and will achieve a prominent position at work. A person dreams of performing the evening prayer inside the Kaaba, then this is an indication of achieving all goals. As for a person’s dream of seeing the afternoon prayer being performed at the Kaaba, this indicates that the dreamer is one who commits sins and disobedience and warns against them. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s vision of the Isha prayer. Al-Nabulsi saw the afternoon prayer in a dream in general and confirmed that it indicates praiseworthy events. Seeing prayer in a dream is an indication of the abundance and goodness that the dreamer finds. The afternoon prayer in a dream indicates the approaching end of problems. Interpretation of seeing the evening prayer in a dream. See the The dreamer who – the evening prayer, this dream indicates in the dream the arrival of good money, sustenance, and abundance. If he sees in a dream that he is praying the evening prayer in the Kaaba, then this vision indicates that he will reach a prominent position, God willing. If he prays on the mountain, this indicates that he will be victorious. Great for his enemies who were waiting for him. Whoever sees this - the evening prayer, this means in the big mosque that he will achieve the goals he seeks. Interpretation of seeing the afternoon prayer in the mosque for the single woman: If an unmarried girl sees herself praying the evening prayer in the mosque, this indicates the end of worry and anxiety and the death of heartache. If she sees herself being worshiped in a dream, this dream is praiseworthy and shows that God Almighty will satisfy her desires. Seeing her crying during the evening prayer inside the mosque means that she is suffering from many problems and needs help. A girl’s dream that she is sitting in the mosque in her dream indicates her desire to get close to the Greatest Lord of the Universe. Interpretation of seeing the evening prayer in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees herself performing the evening prayer inside the mosque, this means that she will overcome all the problems she faces. However, if she sees that she is praying and is happy, this indicates positive changes that will occur in her life. If she sees in her dream that she prostrated and prostrated a lot. From prayer, this vision means that she will soon hear good news. Application of the Asr prayer. In a dream of a divorced woman, it indicates relief from distress, the death of worry, grief, grief, and the nearness of comfort, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about delaying the Asr prayer. If the sick person sees his delay in performing the Isha prayer in a dream, then this dream indicates His health deteriorates. As for the vision? A free girl, she does not perform the evening prayer on time. Why does this dream indicate a delay in her marriage, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi believes that delaying the afternoon prayer is a warning against enemies who want to destroy your life and stop your progress. If a pregnant woman sees herself performing the evening prayer, this dream means that she may fall. Interpretation of seeing the evening prayer in a dream for a young man. Look at Young man praying evening prayer, this dream indicates a solution

title: Interpretation of a dream about caressing one’s brother’s wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about caressing one’s brother’s wife in a dream. Through the following lines, we will show you how important it is to caress your brother’s wife in a dream, and whether it is good or bad. Interpretation of a dream of caressing your brother’s wife in a dream Seeing your brother’s wife hugging in a dream indicates major differences and problems that the dreamer faces with his brother. Hitting your brother’s wife in a dream may mean that the dreamer He fell into comparisons between his wife and his brother’s wife. Caressing a brother’s wife in a dream can also indicate mistakes and difficult judgments. It can also be an indication of the deprivation that the dreamer feels. Interpretation of a dream about my brother’s wife kissing me in a dream. If a married man sees himself kissing his brother’s wife in a dream without lust, then this It indicates his benefit from his brother’s wife. Likewise, kissing my brother’s wife in a dream with lust indicates that he has committed an injustice. When a young man sees that he is kissing his brother’s wife’s hand in a dream, he shows his respect and appreciation for her. But if he sees him kissing his brother’s wife with lust, this indicates that he was wrong in his The dreamer's right. Interpretation of a dream about kissing a nephew in a dream. When you see yourself kissing a nephew in a dream, this is a sign of connection and love. Because this indicates the strength of the relationship between brother and sister in reality and the love that binds them. Kissing a nephew in a dream can also indicate the mercy shown by the dreamer. May It is also an indication that he is helping his nephew with some matters. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a new brother in a dream. When the dreamer sees that he has a new brother in a dream, this may indicate a new beginning for the dreamer. It could also be an indication of some things that appear in the dreamer’s life that shocked or surprised him. The girl indicates An ordinary woman who sees her brother in a dream indicates insecurity and her brother’s search for him. When a pregnant woman sees a new brother in a dream, this indicates the imminent birth of her child. Interpretation of a dream about a sick nephew in a dream. When a dreamer sees his nephew sick in a dream, this is an indication that he is going through a difficult time. If a married woman sees That her sister’s son is sick in a dream, this is an indication of the problems that the boy faces. Also, if a pregnant woman sees her sister’s son sick in a dream, this indicates her fear of the child and her strong attachment to him. It also indicates to the ordinary girl who visits her sister’s son in the hospital that her nephew’s fears It will disappear. Interpretation of a dream about a nephew crawling in a dream: When a married woman sees her nephew crawling and the child in a dream, this indicates that she has been humiliated and insulted by someone. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees her nephew crawling in a dream, this means that there are problems. It also indicates the girl’s general problems in The coming period or obstacles in her relationship and marriage. Interpretation of a dream about my niece getting married to Ibn Sirin in a dream. If a man sees that his niece is getting married in a dream, this is a sign of new changes for the girl. Also, the niece’s marriage to a pregnant woman also shows the approach to marriage and relationship with the girl in a dream. When you see a married woman This in a dream indicates her love for her niece and her happiness in seeing the girl. If an unmarried girl sees a wedding

When a dreamer sees his nephew sick in a dream, this is an indication that he is going through a difficult time. If a married woman sees That her sister’s son is sick in a dream, this is an indication of the problems that the boy faces. Also, if a pregnant woman sees her sister’s son sick in a dream, this indicates her fear of the child and her strong attachment to him. It also indicates to the ordinary girl who visits her sister’s son in the hospital that her nephew’s fears It will disappear. Interpretation of a dream about a nephew crawling in a dream: When a married woman sees her nephew crawling and the child in a dream, this indicates that she has been humiliated and insulted by someone. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees her nephew crawling in a dream, this means that there are problems. It also indicates the girl’s general problems in The coming period or obstacles in her relationship and marriage. Interpretation of a dream about my niece getting married to Ibn Sirin in a dream. If a man sees that his niece is getting married in a dream, this is a sign of new changes for the girl. Also, the niece’s marriage to a pregnant woman also shows the approach to marriage and relationship with the girl in a dream. When you see a married woman This in a dream indicates her love for her niece and her happiness in seeing the girl. If an unmarried girl sees a wedding

title: Interpretation of seeing trees in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Trees in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Today on the Moments website, we present to you what is new and distinctive in this article. In a dream, the interpretation of seeing a dream about trees in a dream, the interpretation of seeing a dream about trees in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, the meaning of a dream about trees, to learn more on the Moments website. Interpretation of the meaning of a dream about trees in a dream. Ibn Sirin narrated in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that seeing a tree in a dream indicates a male Or a female. Seeing a good and beautiful tree indicates good words, a good person, a good deed, or a useful reward that the viewer receives as a result of his work. Interpretation of a dream about seeing green trees: Seeing green trees whose leaves are a sign of a happy and successful life, and as for seeing dry, fallen trees Its leaves are evidence of boredom, loneliness, and failure, and seeing a tree falling in a dream means failure, failure, and problems. As for seeing planting or planting a tree in a dream, it is an indication of a successful project, marriage, or trip, and watering trees in a dream is an indication of the beautiful words that you hear from those you love and adore. And this is good news of pregnancy for a married woman, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing individual trees. Interpretation: Seeing trees in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a good and righteous man who wants to marry her, and a green leafy tree indicates a good husband who is in good condition, and an unmarried woman’s vision of a dry tree without leaves. It is a sign of bad luck. And the failures and challenges that hinder her life’s journey. Seeing an unmarried girl picking fruit from trees is a sign of a man’s intense love for her, and planting a tree in a single man’s dream indicates a year full of news and surprises. To know. Interpretation of a dream about seeing trees for a married woman. Inside the tree: A dream of a married woman, the connotation of the husband, and in the dream of a pregnant woman, the sign of pregnancy, and seeing a green tree is a sign of stability, contentment, and the cessation of pain and aches. The tree in a widow’s dream is a symbol of her life, so if she sees it green, it shows her marriage again, but as for a dry, dry tree It shows sadness and loneliness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing trees for a divorced woman. Green trees inside, a divorced dream, indicate that the divorced woman will return to her husband again or marry someone else, and her life will be full of joy and happiness, and God did not do that. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tall green tree. Seeing a tall green tree in a dream is considered an indication of longevity or available opportunities. To get a job, money, livelihood, or marriage, a man’s dream. As for seeing a tall green tree in a woman’s dream, it is a sign of a wealthy, generous, and kind man, or it is a symbol of the knight of a single girl’s dreams. In general, seeing tall green trees in a dream is good news and a call for optimism or the fulfillment of wishes. And desires and achieving the goal soon, and God knows best. Seeing a cut down tree in a dream. As for seeing a cut down tree in a dream, in both cases it is an indication of his stomach, or divorcing his wife, or his injustice to himself, and cutting down many trees indicates betrayal.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a blue dress in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by seeing a blue dress in a dream and its meaning Clothes are a piece of cloth that covers the human body, some of it for the upper part and some for the lower part, and a person wears clothes for this purpose of covering or decoration in general, the blouse and pants for men and the skirt and dress for women, and there are many dresses of different shapes and colors, including long and short, and the dress is defined as a piece of cloth for women, so what is the interpretation? The dream of seeing a blue dress in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of a dream of wearing a blue dress for a single woman Blue is one of the colors that brings psychological comfort to a person and has recently become one of the colors reserved for the male sex. This vision shows the arrival of good news to this girl, and here are some of these interpretations: An unmarried girl will get married soon when she dreams of a beautiful blue dress. It is also characterized by purity and good morals, if she sees a long blue dress in a dream. This girl is also associated with a good man when she sees the blue dress in her dream. The girl is also exposed to problems and difficulties if she dreams of wearing a blue dress and she is sad. In addition, the unmarried girl meets the knight of her dreams whom she dreamed of marrying, when she saw the long blue dress in her dream. In addition, the girl lives happily and in luxury if she sees the indigo blue dress in her dream. This girl also marries a wealthy man with a prestigious position when she dreams of a long blue dress studded with rubies. Moreover, she strives to postpone her wedding when she dreams of a blue dress. See also: Interpretation of a dream about incestuous marriage by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of a dream about a blue dress for a married woman The interpretation of dreams refers to the state in which a person is, whether single or married, and the interpretation also indicates The shape of the thing he sees in his dream and its situation, and we will mention the most important of them. Interpretations: There is an argument between the woman and her husband and their separation, then each of them returns to the other when she sees the blue dress in her dream. Also, her relationship with her husband collapses and he loses his love for her when he sees her taking off the blue dress in her dream. She also lives happily and contentedly with her life if she sees the beautiful blue dress in her dream. In addition, the pregnant woman goes through an easy birth process without problems, when she sees the blue dress in her dream. It also solves the problems of the married woman and her quarrels with her husband when she sees the blue dress in her dream. In addition, the married woman receives good treatment from her husband if she sees a beautiful blue dress in her dream. In addition, she is exposed to anxiety and sadness when she sees blue dresses one on top of the other in her dream. Also, the pregnant woman gives birth to a boy if she sees the blue dress in her dream. See also: Interpretation of a journey on foot in a dream by the most famous scholars of interpretation A dream about a long blue dress in a dream The color blue indicates peace and kindness in the heart. Many people feel comfortable when they see the color blue. Many people look to the sky when they need comfort, and seeing this a

title: More than 50 interpretations of a dream about mint according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about mintInterpretation of a dream about mint is one of the complex dreams that can be interpreted positively or negatively depending on its condition, shape, and use in the dream. Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi, and others were interested in interpreting it and provided dozens of interpretations for it, and through a specialized Egyptian website, it will explain to you all the interpretations of all the dreamers in their different social situations. What you have to do is Simply follow the paragraphs below. Interpretation of a dream about mint in a dream: Seeing mint in a dream contains ten signs, including good and undesirable, and they will be clarified through the following lines: First: Good suggestions First: This may mean that the dreamer is a person with great energy and determination. Jurists have confirmed that a person who possesses these qualities will be one of the most effective people capable of achieving their goals, no matter how difficult. This was confirmed by the interpreters when they completed the interpretation of this dream and said that the dreamer will be happy with the fulfillment of many ambitions and wishes soon and will live in an atmosphere full of progress and success. Second: The vision shows that the dreamer has high morals and this feature will make his biography fragrant for people and everyone wants to deal with him because he is a good person. His heart is kind and free of grudges and evil. Third: A person naturally tends to live in it and enjoy it, and this vision gives a promising sign that the dreamer will live a long time and his life will be a mixture of peace of mind, comfort and a lot of money. Note that the jurists confirmed that this money will only come from Legitimate jobs that are permissible so that the fortuneteller can enjoy his life in a healthy way that does not conflict with the religious etiquette and teachings that must be followed. Fourth: One of the good signs of this dream is that God blesses the dreamer with the blessing of health and freedom from disease. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Secondly, unwanted signs. Fifth: Perhaps the dreamer who sees the symbol of mint in his dream will fall into many arguments, whether with his wife, friends, or colleagues, depending on the nature of his life and his social status in waking life. Except: The appearance of mint in a dream means that the dreamer will feel fear of the unknown or In particular, the future, and an increased rate of fear or stress will put him in a deplorable psychological state. Optimism and determination to succeed. Seven: If mint appears in the dream and is yellow withered, this is a sign that he will commit a sin soon, and then he will feel shame and remorse. Eight: Yellow mint is a bad symbol that warns the dreamer that he is ignoring his responsibilities that he must carry out to the fullest. Especially since he will neglect many of his professional and religious duties. Consequently, he will stop achieving any success in his life unless he pays more attention to his priorities and tasks than he used to. Ninth: Continuing the interpretation of the previous dream that the dreamer will feel great sorrows, especially in his home in general, his father or mother may get sick or fall into a disaster because of that. Tenth: The dream reveals the many pressures that will be placed on the dreamer, and these pressures have five types that will present themselves:

title: Interpretation of scabies in a dream Scabies disease in a dream

preview.html: An unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man with a skin disease, severe itching, and ulcers on the body, face, leg, foot, head, chest, abdomen, back, and arm dreamed of by Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of scabies in a dream: Scabies if there is no water in it. It is hardship or fatigue on the part of the oppressor or the powerful. If water is found in the place of the crust, it shows greatness of money from toil, toil, and sweat. It is said: Whoever sees scabies. Or leprosy on oneself, as this is more expensive to interpret than seeing the dreamer in others. Whoever sees that he has a scab, then rubs it, and does not have water or pus, then he is tired of his relatives. He is from his tribe, and if it is in his stomach, then it is from his money and children, and if there is water in the scab, then it affects money with them and effort, and if it is scratched and painful, then it is. It is money with sheep, and if there is pus or pus in it, it will affect the increase of this money, and it was said that scabies and itching are among the concerns of people and their power over those who harm them. Whoever dreams: that he is afflicted with scabies, and it appears to the left, and wealth is to the right of the poor, and it appears Leadership is for the rich, and it is better for a man to see that he is suffering from scabies or leprosy. Or pimples or smallpox, for the dreamer, and if he sees it in his possession, he is not fit to serve him, and if it is his son, then he will not obey his son in sexual intercourse, even if he is. His wife, this indicates that everything she does is bad. And if he sees scabs on his neck, then it is a debt on him. And if there is scabs in it, it means anxiety and exhaustion from relatives. If there is water in the scab, then it is a financial injury from toil. It is said that scabs on the poor indicate wealth. For the rich, this means leadership. It was said If he saw scabs or leprosy on himself, he was more fond of interpretation than seeing it on others. Interpretation of scabies in a dream by Ibn Sirin (seeing scabies) And whoever sees that his body is infected with scabies, he will obtain money from fatigue if he rubs it and water comes out of it. He will obtain money without Fatigue. And whoever sees many scabs on his body and recovers from them immediately, then this is in two ways: loss of money or salvation from distress and distress, and if its traces remain on his body, he will collect money. Some interpreters have said: Whoever sees that his body is infected with scabies, then he will gain money from fatigue, hardship, and hardship. Whoever dreams that he is a leper or a leper, he will obtain money, grace, and honor, according to the Almighty’s words: “As for man, if his Lord tempts him, He will honor him and bestow blessings upon him.” Perhaps leprosy is money and clothes, and leprosy if blood and pus flow from it, then the acquisition of illegal money. The miserable lawsuit may be attributed to the person with leprosy who is innocent of it, and a calamity befalls him, himself, his money, or his family. It was said: lepers dream and eat. With the accompaniment of those he hates. As for scabies, it is interpreted in three ways: money, obscene words printed on it, and the appearance of the thing that he hates. He said: Whoever dreams that the plague has struck him indicates that he will die a martyr. As for urine juice, it is the manifestation of what a man hates, and it is said: weak in strength. Ibn Sirin said. A dream about a plague indicates sadness, turmoil, tension, and anxiety. The meaning of scabies in a dream is for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a woman.

If water is found in the place of the crust, it shows greatness of money from toil, toil, and sweat. It is said: Whoever sees scabies. Or leprosy on oneself, as this is more expensive to interpret than seeing the dreamer in others. Whoever sees that he has a scab, then rubs it, and does not have water or pus, then he is tired of his relatives. He is from his tribe, and if it is in his stomach, then it is from his money and children, and if there is water in the scab, then it affects money with them and effort, and if it is scratched and painful, then it is. It is money with sheep, and if there is pus or pus in it, it will affect the increase of this money, and it was said that scabies and itching are among the concerns of people and their power over those who harm them. Whoever dreams: that he is afflicted with scabies, and it appears to the left, and wealth is to the right of the poor, and it appears Leadership is for the rich, and it is better for a man to see that he is suffering from scabies or leprosy. Or pimples or smallpox, for the dreamer, and if he sees it in his possession, he is not fit to serve him, and if it is his son, then he will not obey his son in sexual intercourse, even if he is. His wife, this indicates that everything she does is bad. And if he sees scabs on his neck, then it is a debt on him. And if there is scabs in it, it means anxiety and exhaustion from relatives. If there is water in the scab, then it is a financial injury from toil. It is said that scabs on the poor indicate wealth. For the rich, this means leadership. It was said If he saw scabs or leprosy on himself, he was more fond of interpretation than seeing it on others. Interpretation of scabies in a dream by Ibn Sirin (seeing scabies) And whoever sees that his body is infected with scabies, he will obtain money from fatigue if he rubs it and water comes out of it. He will obtain money without Fatigue. And whoever sees many scabs on his body and recovers from them immediately, then this is in two ways: loss of money or salvation from distress and distress, and if its traces remain on his body, he will collect money. Some interpreters have said: Whoever sees that his body is infected with scabies, then he will gain money from fatigue, hardship, and hardship. Whoever dreams that he is a leper or a leper, he will obtain money, grace, and honor, according to the Almighty’s words: “As for man, if his Lord tempts him, He will honor him and bestow blessings upon him.” Perhaps leprosy is money and clothes, and leprosy if blood and pus flow from it, then the acquisition of illegal money. The miserable lawsuit may be attributed to the person with leprosy who is innocent of it, and a calamity befalls him, himself, his money, or his family. It was said: lepers dream and eat. With the accompaniment of those he hates. As for scabies, it is interpreted in three ways: money, obscene words printed on it, and the appearance of the thing that he hates. He said: Whoever dreams that the plague has struck him indicates that he will die a martyr. As for urine juice, it is the manifestation of what a man hates, and it is said: weak in strength. Ibn Sirin said. A dream about a plague indicates sadness, turmoil, tension, and anxiety. The meaning of scabies in a dream is for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a woman.
